thread.title: Oscars: Massive Best Picture Mistake Becomes Internet Gold | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: Oscars: Massive Best Picture Mistake Becomes Internet Gold | Hollywood Reporter

author: Ryan Parker
title: Oscars: Massive Best Picture Mistake Becomes Internet Gold | Hollywood Reporter
text:
COMMENTS 'La La Land' was announced as the winner, but 'Moonlight' actually won. 
After a massive turn of events on Sunday night during the best picture presentation, the internet lit up with memes and GIFs referencing Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway's mistake. 
La La Land was announced as the winner, but Moonlight actually won. 
Most viewers likely thought the mistake was a joke, but it was made clear pretty quickly when Beatty said there was in fact a mistake. 
Social media users were savage.
